feature_reports.description: features of each data point in the scenario

commercial_line_type.description: Array of the wire types that make up the line

properties.title: UpgradeParamsBaseModel
properties.description: Contains results from all jobs in the simulation.

outputs.title: outputs
outputs.description: Outputs for each job in the simulation.

violation_summary.title: upgrade_summary
violation_summary.description: Contains thermal or voltage upgrade results for each job

costs_per_equipment.title: costs_per_equipment
costs_per_equipment.description: Contains upgrade cost information for each job by equipment type

equipment.title: equipment
equipment.description: Contains equipment information for each job

upgraded_opendss_model_file.title: upgraded_opendss_model_file
upgraded_opendss_model_file.description: Path to file that will load the upgraded network.

feeder_stats.title: feeder_stats
feeder_stats.description: Path to file containing feeder metadata and equipment details before and after upgrades.

return_code.title: return_code
return_code.description: Return code from process. Zero is success, non-zero is a failure.

UpgradeSimulationOutputModel.title: UpgradeParamsBaseModel
UpgradeSimulationOutputModel.description: Contains outputs from all jobs in the simulation.

log_file.title: log_file
log_file.description: Path to log file for the simulation.

jobs.title: jobs
jobs.description: Outputs for each job in the simulation.

UpgradeViolationResultModel.title: UpgradeParamsBaseModel
UpgradeViolationResultModel.description: Defines result parameters for thermal upgrades.

name.title: name
name.description: Job name that produced the result

scenario.title: scenario
scenario.description: Simulation scenario describing the controls being used

stage.title: stage
stage.description: Stage of upgrades: initial (before upgrades) or final (after upgrades)

upgrade_type.title: upgrade_type
upgrade_type.description: Type of upgrade: thermal or voltage

thermal_violations_present.title: thermal_violations_present
thermal_violations_present.description: Flag indicating whether thermal violations are present

voltage_violations_present.title: voltage_violations_present
voltage_violations_present.description: Flag indicating whether voltage violations are present

max_bus_voltage.title: max_bus_voltage
max_bus_voltage.description: Maximum voltage recorded on any bus

min_bus_voltage.title: min_bus_voltage
min_bus_voltage.description: Minimum voltage recorded on any bus

num_voltage_violation_buses.title: num_voltage_violation_buses
num_voltage_violation_buses.description: Number of buses with voltage violations

num_overvoltage_violation_buses.title: num_overvoltage_violation_buses
num_overvoltage_violation_buses.description: Number of buses with voltage above voltage_upper_limit

voltage_upper_limit.title: voltage_upper_limit
voltage_upper_limit.description: Voltage upper limit, the threshold considered for determining overvoltages

num_undervoltage_violation_buses.title: num_undervoltage_violation_buses
num_undervoltage_violation_buses.description: Number of buses with voltage below voltage_lower_limit

voltage_lower_limit.title: voltage_lower_limit
voltage_lower_limit.description: Voltage lower limit, the threshold considered for determining undervoltages

num_line_violations.title: num_line_violations
num_line_violations.description: Number of lines with loading above line upper limit

line_upper_limit.title: line_upper_limit
line_upper_limit.description: Line upper limit, the threshold considered for determining line overloading

num_transformer_violations.title: num_transformer_violations
num_transformer_violations.description: Number of transformers with loading above transformer upper limit

transformer_upper_limit.title: transformer_upper_limit
transformer_upper_limit.description: Transformer upper limit, the threshold considered for determining transformer overloading

TotalUpgradeCostsResultModel.title: UpgradeParamsBaseModel
TotalUpgradeCostsResultModel.description: Provides total output costs for upgrading a type of equipment.

reopt_assumptions_file_path.description: File path of REopt assumptions file used to generate results, if known

annual_renewable_electricity_pct.description: Percentage of annual renewable electricity generation

npv_us_dollars.description: Net present value of savings realized by the project

year_one_energy_cost_us_dollars.description: Optimal year one utility energy cost

year_one_demand_cost_us_dollars.description: Optimal year one utility demand cost

total_energy_cost_us_dollars.description: Total utility energy cost over the lifecycle, after-tax

location.description: Location of PV. Available options are roof, ground or both.

average_yearly_energy_produced_kwh.description: average yearly energy produced in kWh

size_class.description: Turbine size-class. One of [residential, commercial, medium, large]

peak_demand_kw.description: Peak demand in kw for this type

number_of_nodes_in_network.description: Number of nodes of this type in the network

eui_reasonableness.description: Whether the EUI is within ASHRAE 90.1-2013 bounds for that building type

end_use_by_category.description: Whether building energy use is within ASHRAE 90.1-2013 bounds for that building type

mechanical_system_part_load_efficiency.description: Whether 40% & 80% heating and cooling efficiency is within ASHRAE 90.1-2013 bounds for that building type

simultaneous_heating_and_cooling.description: Whether heating and cooling are occuring during the same hour when cooling load exists

internal_loads.description: Whether lighting, plug, and equipment use is within ASHRAE 90.1-2013 bounds for that building type

schedules.description: Whether lighting, ventilation, occupant, plug, and equipment schedules are within ASHRAE 90.1-2013 bounds for that building type

envelope_r_value.description: Whether building envelope is within ASHRAE 90.1-2013 bounds for that building type

domestic_hot_water.description: Whether DHW energy use is within 2011 ASHRAE handbook bounds for that building type

mechanical_system_efficiency.description: Whether heating and cooling efficiency is within ASHRAE 90.1-2013 bounds for that building type

supply_and_zone_air_temperature.description: Whether fan effectiveness is within ASHRAE 90.1-2013 bounds for that building type

total_qaqc_flags.description: How many QAQC flags have been raised for this feature or scenario

id.description: Id refers to the id of a building/feature

name.description: name refers to the name of the feature (eg. Building 1, tranformer 5)

id.description: Id refers to the id of the reporting period. Ids of reporting periods are matched across simulations, so the same period of time gets the same id for all simulations.

name.description: name refers to the name of the reporting period(eg. Annual, January)

multiplier.description: Multiplier used if this reporting period is representative of mulitple periods.  For example one week simulation that represents entire month.

total_site_energy_kwh.description: Total energy used on site, does not include generation (kWh)

total_source_energy_kwh.description: Total source energy used, does not include generation (kWh)

net_utility_cost_dollar.description: Net utility cost for reporting period includes generation ($)

electricity_kwh.description: Sum of all electricity used, does not include electricity produced (kWh)

natural_gas_kwh.description: Sum of all natural gas end uses consumption (kWh)

propane_kwh.description: Sum of all propane end uses consumption (kWh)

fuel_oil_kwh.description: Sum of all fuel oil #2 end uses consumption (kWh)

other_fuels_kwh.description: Sum of all other (fuel oil #1, diesel, gasoline, coal, steam) fuel end uses consumption (kWh)

district_cooling_kwh.description: Sum of all distric cooling end uses consumption (kWh)

district_heating_kwh.description: Sum of all distric heating end uses consumption (kWh)

water_qbft.description: Sum of all water end uses consumption (ft^3)

energy_production_kwh.description: Energy produced for reporting period.  Water reported in m^3, all others in kWh.

future_annual_electricity_emissions_mt.description: Future emissions in metric ton (mt) calculated based on an annual emission factor value for the selected future year

future_hourly_electricity_emissions_mt.description: Future emissions in metric ton (mt) calculated based on hourly emission factor values for the selected future year

historical_annual_electricity_emissions_.description: Historical emissions in metric ton (mt) calculated based on an annual emission factor value for the selected historical year

historical_hourly_electricity_emissions_.description: Historical emissions in metric ton (mt) calculated based on hourly emission factor values for the selected historical year

future_annual_electricity_emissions_inte.description: Future emissions intensity in kg/ft2 calculated based on an annual emission factor value for the selected future year

future_hourly_electricity_emissions_inte.description: Future emissions intensity in kg/ft2 calculated based on hourly emission factor values for the selected future year

historical_annual_electricity_emissions_.description: Historical emissions intensity in kg/ft2 calculated based on an annual emission factor value for the selected historical year

historical_hourly_electricity_emissions_.description: Historical emissions intensity in kg/ft2 calculated based on hourly emission factor values for the selected historical year

natural_gas_emissions_mt.description: Natural Gas emissions in mt calculated based on EPA eGRID data and calculated using 20-year GWP horizon based on ASHRAE 189.1

natural_gas_emissions_intensity_kg_per_f.description: Natural Gas emissions intensity in kg/ft2 calculated based on EPA eGRID data and calculated using 20-year GWP horizon based on ASHRAE 189.1

propane_emissions_mt.description: Propane emissions in mt calculated based on EPA eGRID data and calculated using 20-year GWP horizon based on ASHRAE 189.1

propane_emissions_intensity_kg_per_ft2.description: Propane emissions intensity in kg/ft2 calculated based on EPA eGRID data and calculated using 20-year GWP horizon based on ASHRAE 189.1

fueloil_no2_emissions_mt.description: FuelOilNo2 emissions in mt calculated based on EPA eGRID data and calculated using 20-year GWP horizon based on ASHRAE 189.1

fueloil_no2_emissions_intensity_kg_per_f.description: FuelOilNo2 emissions intensity in kg/ft2 calculated based on EPA eGRID data and calculated using 20-year GWP horizon based on ASHRAE 189.1

EndUses.description: End uses for reporting period.  Does not include energy produced. Water reported in m^3, all others in kWh.

ConstructionCost.description: Program related information, does not change in time

item_name.description: Name of the item being costed, e.g. the name of the exterior wall construction

unit_cost.description: Cost per unit of item, e.g. cost per area of construction.  This can be adjusted in post processing.

cost_units.description: Unit of cost for this item

item_quantity.description: Amount of the item in units corresponding to cost_units

total_cost.description: Total cost is unit_cost multiplied by item_quantity. Can be updated if unit_cost is changed.

latitude_deg.description: latitude for the centroid of the feature (deg)

longitude_deg.description: longitude for the centroid of the feature (deg)

site_area_sqft.description: Area of the entire site or lot (ft^2)

maximum_roof_height_ft.description: Maximum height of the roof relative to surface elevation (ft)

maximum_number_of_stories.description: The maximum number of building stories, sum of number of above and below ground stories.

maximum_number_of_stories_above_ground.description: The maximum number of building stories above ground

number_of_parking_spaces_charging.description: Number of parking spaces with electric vehicle charging

maximum_parking_height_ft.description: Maximum height of the parking structure relative to surface elevation (ft)

maximum_number_of_parking_stories.description: The maximum number of parking stories, sum of number of above and below ground stories.

maximum_number_of_parking_stories_above_.description: The maximum number of parking stories above ground

orientation_deg.description: Rotation of longest axis from East-West,about up axis (deg)

aspect_ratio.description: Ratio of longest to shortest axis

total_construction_cost_dollar.description: total construction cost calculated from the defined cost per floor area ($)

floor_area.description: Building gross floor area of this type (ft^2)

its_size.description: Total central plant TES capacity in kWh

ptes_size.description: Total distributed/packaged TES capacity in kWh
